Package de.oth.blocklib.helper.chunk

Class ChunkCalculations

java.lang.Object
de.oth.blocklib.helper.chunk.ChunkCalculations
public class ChunkCalculations
extends java.lang.Object
A class that provides static methods that may be needed, when calculating positions for chunks.
Author:
Tobias Mueller

    • getPositionInChunk

      public static void getPositionInChunk​(org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f globPos, Chunk chunk, Vector3i result)
      Calculates the Array-position of the stone at globPos, inside its chunks array
      Parameters:
      globPos - The global position that should be converted.
      cID - the ChunkIDObject that is responsible for that global position.
      result - the Vector in which the result should be written.

    • getGlobalPosition

      public static void getGlobalPosition​(int x, int y, int z, ChunkIDObject cID, Vector3i result)
      Calculates the global position of a block in a Chunk
      Parameters:
      x - the x coordinate in the chunk
      y - the y coordinate in the chunk
      z - the z coordinate in the chunk
      cID - the ChunkIDObject that is responsible for that global position.
      result - the Vector in which the result should be written.

      public static org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f getChunkMiddle​(ChunkIDObject cID)
      Calculates the actual middle position of the Chunks position
      Parameters:
      cID - the ChunkIDObject of the chunk
      Returns:
